sinaiticus.text: The elder to the beloved Gaius, whom I love in truth.

verses.text: The elder to the beloved Gaius, whom I love in truth.

sinaiticus.text: Beloved, concerning all things I pray that thou mayest prosper and be in health, as thy soul prospers.

verses.text: Beloved, concerning all things I pray that thou mayest prosper and be in health, as thy soul prospers.

sinaiticus.text: For I rejoiced greatly when the brethren came and testified to thy truth, as thou walkest in the truth.

verses.text: For I rejoiced greatly when the brethren came and testified to thy truth, as thou walkest in the truth.

sinaiticus.text: I have no joy greater than this, that I hear of my children walking in the truth.

verses.text: I have no joy greater than this, that I hear of my children walking in the truth.

sinaiticus.text: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatever thou workest for the brethren, and for strangers,

verses.text: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatever thou workest for the brethren, and for strangers,

sinaiticus.text: who have testified to thy love before the church, whom thou wilt do well in conducting forward in a manner worthy of God.

verses.text: who have testified to thy love before the church, whom thou wilt do well in conducting forward in a manner worthy of God.

sinaiticus.text: For in behalf of the name they went forth, taking nothing from the heathen.

verses.text: For in behalf of the name they went forth, taking nothing from the heathen.

sinaiticus.text: We then, ought to receive such, that we may become fellow- workmen for the truth.

verses.text: We then, ought to receive such, that we may become fellow- workmen for the truth.

sinaiticus.text: I wrote somewhat to the church; but Diotrephes, who loves the pre- eminence over them, receives us not.

verses.text: I wrote somewhat to the church; but Diotrephes, who loves the pre- eminence over them, receives us not.

sinaiticus.text: Wherefore, if I come, I will bring to remembrance the works that he does, prating against us with evil words; and not content with this, he neither himself receives the brethren, and those that would he hinders and casts out of the church.

verses.text: Wherefore, if I come, I will bring to remembrance the works that he does, prating against us with evil words; and not content with this, he neither himself receives the brethren, and those that would he hinders and casts out of the church.

sinaiticus.text: Beloved, imitate not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that does good is of God: he that does evil has not seen God.

verses.text: Beloved, imitate not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that does good is of God: he that does evil has not seen God.

sinaiticus.text: To Demetrius good testimony is given by all and by the truth itself; and we also testify, and you know that our testimony is true.

verses.text: To Demetrius good testimony is given by all and by the truth itself; and we also testify, and you know that our testimony is true.

sinaiticus.text: I had many things to write to thee, but I will not write to thee by means of ink and pen:

verses.text: I had many things to write to thee, but I will not write to thee by means of ink and pen:

sinaiticus.text: I hope, however, to see thee soon, and we will speak mouth to mouth.

verses.text: I hope, however, to see thee soon, and we will speak mouth to mouth.
